review:
Quick Analysis 
There is no unnecessary waitng time
All Digitalised
Explaining and satisfying patient questions is not too easy, his answers all responsible
Advising with good care.
Since I am new he knows my history and earlier advise and checked whether was I took proper rest.
Well coordinated with other staff to send off the patients.
Staffs are very responsible.
God Bless Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: There is no greater expert than him who understands the pains and sufferings of the patients and gives them appropriate treatment. He is the true God.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Kanniraj is excellent to approach with patients. Well convincing has a healing touch, and does prescribe medicine what is really essential. Just started his advice n prescription for shoulder pain, will let you know in details over the course of healing. The physiotherapist feedback to excercise was also commendable.
Although appointment was taken in the morning for evening visit waiting time due to first come first serve basis is there, but no regrets on it.
Could make the receptionists let the patient know when our turn is in advance but pardonable. A digital display could make a difference for this purpose. Pharmacy seems nominal. Overall ambience is calm and worthy. Hope this kind of treatment sustains and never change in due course of time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have tried many doctors for wife's toe problem but
1. None of the doctor give the reason for the problem
2. None of the doctor has even touched the leg and understand the problem.
3. All the doctors first ask to take X ray and give pain killer tablets and ask to do physiotherapy for 10 days but the problems still persist

After visiting Dr.Kanniraj we feel some positive approach as he described the problem clearly and he didn't ask us to take X ray and did ask us to go for physiotherapy...he has asked us to do simple excercise after understanding the problem and we think it would cure her pain. Thanks to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Made a systematic approach towards diagnosis. First of all touched and did a detailed diagnosis which is very rare these days (I'm not referring pandemic here). He listened with patience when we explained the pain and as well explained about the history of the injury.

Advised medication, and suggested that if the pain reduces no need of further investigation. Didn't advise unnecessary imaging.

Most importantly consoled and gave confidence.

I Would highly recommend to anyone who needs a good Ortho consultation.

I, personally, belong to the medical field. So I can definitely say that Dr. Kanniraj has done really great job when I underwent the operation for my Shoulder injury. It's been a year now, I have gained total strength in my leg and even walking has become normal. Definitely, his years of experience helped me a lot in getting my normal life back.

Thank you so much, Dr. Kanniraj.
